Html: Sorry if this is a terrible question, but how do I re-size the main window after start-up?
Use the grip in the lower right corner, because ResizeMode="CanResizeWithGrip" is the default. To resize programmatically just set Width and Height of the MainWindow.
What is the default name of MainWindow?
Look at your code, x:Name="..." But you don't need a name, there is a reference in App.Current.MainWindow or in thecode behind just this.
